pages.text: $(thing)Vampire Hunters/$ were once Illagers, who have turned from attacking villages to defending them from the threat of vampires.
They have a chance of noticing when a mob dies from a vampire's feeding, and Villagers will call them to their aid if they notice a vampire feeding on them!
They have crossbows, and will use them against you from a distance. They also have wooden swords for up-close fighting, so be careful!
